title: Isle Royale National Park: Planning
body: Planning      Documents Open for Public Review  Loading ...  There are currently no projects with documents open for public review for Isle Royale National Park.    Other Plans and Projects An archive of completed projects as well as projects without documents open for comment may be found on the PEPC website.   Â    Major planning documents pertaining to Isle Royale National Park are posted here. Many of the plans are large documents that may take some time to open.  To access most of the documents, your computer will require Adobe Reader.   Main Planning Documents  Environmental Assessment Improvement of Recreation Opportunities for Concession Employees at Rock Harbor - 2008  Document Type PDF  Fire Management Plan 2004 Document Type HTML Fire Management Plan - Finding of No Significant Impact Document Type PDF  General Management Plan - 1998 Document Type PDF  Wilderness Designation Legislation 1976 Document Type PDF  National Park Laws: February 4, 1932 Document Type PDF  Enabling Legislation - 1931  Cultural Resource Reports and Documents  Cultural Resources Management Plan - In Development Document Type PDF  Cultural Landscape Inventory Tobin Harbor - 2011 Document Type PDF  Historic Structures Maintenance Guide - 2010 Document Type PDF  Checklist for Routine Repair and Maintenance of Historic Structures at Isle Royale - 2010 Document Type PDF  Cultural Resources on Isle Royale: An Historic Context - 2010 Document Type PDF  Historic Property Lease Management Policies - 2006  Document Type PDF  An Ethnohistory of the Scandinavian Folk Fishermen Document Type PDF
